math_arithmetic.tooltip: Perform arithmetic operation on two numbers

math_single.tooltip: Perform mathematical operation on a number

math_number_property.tooltip: Check if number satisfies a specific property

math_change.tooltip: Add a number to the variable

math_on_list.tooltip: Perform statistical calculation on a list of numbers

math_modulo.tooltip: Return the remainder of dividing two numbers

math_constrain.tooltip: Constrain a number to be within a specified range

math_random_int.tooltip: Return a random integer within the specified range

math_random_float.tooltip: Return a random decimal between 0 and 1

math_atan2.tooltip: Return the angle from origin to point (x, y)

math_round_to_decimal.tooltip: Round a number to the specified decimal places

map_to.tooltip: Linearly map a value from one range to another

math_bitwise_shift.tooltip: Bit shift operation: left shift (<<) or right shift (>>)

math_bitwise_logic.tooltip: Bitwise logic operation: AND (&), OR (|), XOR (^)

math_extract_bits.tooltip: Extract specified bit segment from a value

math_combine_bits.tooltip: Combine high and low parts into a value of specified width

math_bitread.tooltip: Read the value (0 or 1) of specified bit

math_single_tooltip.ROOT: Square Root: Calculate the square root of a number
math_single_tooltip.ABS: Absolute: Return the absolute value of a number
math_single_tooltip.NEG: Negate: Return the opposite of a number
math_single_tooltip.LN: Natural Log: Calculate the natural logarithm (base e)
math_single_tooltip.EXP: Exponential: Calculate e raised to the power
math_single_tooltip.POW10: Power of 10: Calculate 10 raised to the power

math_trig_tooltip.SIN: Sine: Calculate the sine of an angle (input in degrees)
math_trig_tooltip.COS: Cosine: Calculate the cosine of an angle (input in degrees)
math_trig_tooltip.TAN: Tangent: Calculate the tangent of an angle (input in degrees)
math_trig_tooltip.ASIN: Arcsine: Calculate the angle from a sine value (returns degrees)
math_trig_tooltip.ACOS: Arccosine: Calculate the angle from a cosine value (returns degrees)
math_trig_tooltip.ATAN: Arctangent: Calculate the angle from a tangent value (returns degrees)
